title: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: I encountered a bug where deleting items from the Coolbar corrupts the layout. This bug was observed in Build 2002071610021.
OB:
When running the attached test case and following these steps:
1. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem).
2. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on the first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item.
3. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
4. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on the first row), placing it after the Search coolitem.
5. Press the Delete button.

Expected Behavior (EB):
- The first item on the second row should be deleted.
- The second row should remain unaffected.

Actual Behavior (AB):
- The second row is completely removed when the Delete button is pressed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row.
3. Drag the Launch coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Script item.
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
5. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Search coolitem.
6. Press the Delete button and observe that the second row is removed instead of just deleting the first item on the second row.
